resources.string: Welcome To The Body Of Christ Willoughby!
The mission of the Body of Christ Community is to lead people into a growing relationship with Jesus Christ by reaching out to them with the love and compassion that Jesus first extended to us.
Join Us For Worship Every Sunday 10am!
Body of Christ Community | 38057 Erie Road, Willoughby, Ohio 44094

Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age. (Matthew 28:19-20)
Sermon By Pastor Eric-Love One Another
Thank You So Much For Checking Out Our App! May The LORD BE WITH YOU In All That You Do!!And Feel Free To Contact Us At Anytime!!
